des: "This simple infusion results in a very fragrant and gently sweetened vodka that makes lovely cocktails. I've no idea how long this will keep because it disappears quickly."
ins: Place strawberries in a clean, dry sealable container; add vodka. Seal container and store in a cool, dark area until strawberries lose their color, 3 to 4 days. Remove strawberries and strain vodka into a container.
